original: de lta bur gyur pa'i padma zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i padma zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It is a lotus in that way, that is the meaning.

original: khyad par du byed pa ma gzung par khyad par la blo 'jug par mi 'gyur zhes so //
analyzed: khyad par du byed pa ma gzung par khyad par la blo 'jug par mi 'gyur zhes so //
translated: The mind does not engage in the distinction without taking the distinction-maker, it is said.

original: lte ba khyad par du byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: lte ba khyad par du byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: yang na chos 'byung ni bha ga las don gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: yang na chos 'byung ni bha ga las don gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Or, the source of phenomena is not a different object than the bhaga.

original: sna tshogs ni sna tshogs kyi padma dang ldan pa'i lte ba la sogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sna tshogs ni sna tshogs kyi padma dang ldan pa'i lte ba la sogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: sna tshogs padma 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sna tshogs padma 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not just the varied lotus,

original: chos 'byung gi khongs su sna tshogs padma la rab tu dgram par bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: chos 'byung gi khongs su sna tshogs padma la rab tu dgram par bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
translated: but the varied lotus is to be spread out within the source of phenomena, it is connected.

original: ci byas nas zhes pa la /
analyzed: ci byas nas zhes pa la /
translated: What is done?

original: bris zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: bris zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: It is said drawn, etc.

original: chos kun ni aa la sogs pa dang ka la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid gcig tu yang dag par bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: chos kun ni aa la sogs pa dang ka la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid gcig tu yang dag par bsdus pa'o //

analyzed: byas zhes pa ni re mig bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i gnas la gdod par bya'o zhes pa ni rnam grangs so //
translated: The word made means placed in the forty-nine squares. Alternating is a synonym.

analyzed: 'dir sngags tshig ni 'di yin te zhes pa ni re'u mig bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i gnas su gnas pa la /
translated: Here, the mantra words are as follows. In the places of the forty-nine squares,

original: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags rkang ba brgyad par 'gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags rkang ba brgyad par 'gyur pa ste /

original: kun kyang yan lag dang nyid lag tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun kyang yan lag dang nyid lag tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: All of them are limbs and sub-limbs.

original: yi ge las skyes pa'i sngags su bstan te /
analyzed: yi ge las skyes pa'i sngags su bstan te /

original: ji ltar skud pa yod pa la snam bu zer ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: ji ltar skud pa yod pa la snam bu zer ba lta bu'o //

original: de yang ji ltar dgod ces pa a'a li zhes pa la sogs pa la gnyis pa'i gcig tshig phyis pa'o //
analyzed: de yang ji ltar dgod ces pa a'a li zhes pa la sogs pa la gnyis pa'i gcig tshig phyis pa'o //
translated: And how is it arranged? ƒÄli and kƒÅli and so on. The second singular ending is elided.

original: k'a li mnyam byas zhes pa ni yi ge gcig dang mi @171a * //üîΩ'dor bas so //
analyzed: k'a li mnyam byas zhes pa ni yi ge gcig dang mi @171a * // 'dor bas so //

original: gzhan nga nya na na ma spangs pa'o zhes bstan to //
analyzed: gzhan nga nya na na ma spangs pa'o zhes bstan to //
translated: The others, a, a·πÉ, na, na·πÉ, are not abandoned.

original: de ltar gyur pa'i a'a li dang k'a li bkod pa'i dgram pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i a'a li dang k'a li bkod pa'i dgram pa ste /
translated: Thus, the arrangement of the ƒÄli and KƒÅli is the arrangement.

original: de yongs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa'o //
translated: That is the transformation.

original: de las skye zhing yongs su gyur pa ni gnas skabs kyi khyad par du yongs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de las skye zhing yongs su gyur pa ni gnas skabs kyi khyad par du yongs su gyur pa'o //

original: de gang zhes pa la ;
analyzed: de gang zhes pa la ;
translated: What is that?

original: sde tshan zhes gsungs te dgu ba phyis pa'i lnga pa'o //
analyzed: sde tshan zhes gsungs te dgu ba phyis pa'i lnga pa'o //
translated: He says, ‚Äúgroup.‚Äù The fifth of the nine is elided.

original: sde tshan brgyad rnams blang zhing yongs su gyur pa de ni sde tshan brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gnas skabs kyi khyad par shes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sde tshan brgyad rnams blang zhing yongs su gyur pa de ni sde tshan brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gnas skabs kyi khyad par shes pa'i don to //

original: de'i phyir 'di dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Therefore he says, ‚Äúthis‚Äù and so on.

original: sde tshan bzhi dang bzhi ru zhes byas la //
analyzed: sde tshan bzhi dang bzhi ru zhes byas la //

original: zhes pa ni shes par bya ba gang yin pa de de bzhin du dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni shes par bya ba gang yin pa de de bzhin du dgod par bya'o //
translated: This is what is to be known. That should be set forth in that way.

original: yid ni thub pa ste /
analyzed: yid ni thub pa ste /
translated: The mind is the Sage.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa dang sngags kyi theg pa'i nang nas gtso po ni sngags kyi theg pa ste /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa dang sngags kyi theg pa'i nang nas gtso po ni sngags kyi theg pa ste /

analyzed: de bkod par shes pa ni gsang sngags kyi theg pa ni thub pa ste /

analyzed: mchog go / de la aa la sogs pa dbyangs yig bcu drug ni sde tshan gcig go //
translated: There, the sixteen vowels beginning with a are one group.

original: yi ge lnga lnga ni ka la sogs pa nas ma'i bar du sde tshan lnga'o //
analyzed: yi ge lnga lnga ni ka la sogs pa nas ma'i bar du sde tshan lnga'o //

analyzed: ya ra la wa bzhi ni sde tshan gcig go //
translated: The four ya ra la va are one group.üîΩThe four ≈õa ·π£a sa ha are the best.

analyzed: sha sha sa ha ni mchog go / ka dang sha gnyis yang dag par sbyong ba las skyes pa ni ksha ste 'dir dgos pa med pas ma bstan no //
translated: The two ka and ≈õa are perfectly combined, and the result is k·π£a. Since it is not needed here, it is not taught.

original: 'dir sde tshan brgyad go bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir sde tshan brgyad go bar bya'o //

original: der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya //
analyzed: der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya //

original: zhes pa ni a'a li k'a li la gnas pa'i dpa' po'i rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags btu bar bya ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni a'a li k'a li la gnas pa'i dpa' po'i rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags btu bar bya ste /

original: zhol gnas pa'i mar lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhol gnas pa'i mar lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the butter that abides in the curd.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //üîΩbzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin pa //üîΩzhes pa ni sde tshan bzhi pa'i lnga pa ni na'o ;
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o // bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin pa // zhes pa ni sde tshan bzhi pa'i lnga pa ni na'o ;

original: / lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // zhes pa ni ma'o //
analyzed: / lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // zhes pa ni ma'o //

analyzed: lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // zhes pa ni bha'o //

analyzed: dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang // zhes pa ni go'o //

analyzed: ni'i sgras ni bstod pa'i khyad par ro //

original: bha ni nyon mongs pa 'joms pas na bha ste /
analyzed: bha ni nyon mongs pa 'joms pas na bha ste /

original: de ya bha ga'i don to //
analyzed: de ya bha ga'i don to //

original: ga ni phyis brjod par bya'o ;
analyzed: ga ni phyis brjod par bya'o ;

original: / de ltar yang /
analyzed: / de ltar yang /

analyzed: bha ni bha ga zhes su gsungs //

analyzed: zhes bya'o // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa dgu pa // zhes pa ni ba'o //

analyzed: de bzhin zhes pa ni sems can gyi don ston te /

analyzed: thabs dang shes rab bsdus pas na ste 'brel pa zhes dgongs so // bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang // zhes pa ni ta'o //

analyzed: @171b ta'i sde tshan nas bzung ste bzhi pa'i dang po ni ta nyid do //

analyzed: mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang // zhes pa ni wa'o //

analyzed: so dang mchu las byung zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of from the teeth and lips.

original: de nyid kyi ni gnyis ba dang // zhes pa ni mthar gnas pa'i de nyid gang yin pa'i yi ge gnyis pa de blangs te dpa' bo btu bar bya'o zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi ni gnyis ba dang // zhes pa ni mthar gnas pa'i de nyid gang yin pa'i yi ge gnyis pa de blangs te dpa' bo btu bar bya'o zhes sbyar ro //

original: sum cu pa ni zhes pa ni //
analyzed: sum cu pa ni zhes pa ni //
translated: The thirtieth is the a

analyzed: de sum cu pa'i don to //

analyzed: zhes pa ni la'o //

analyzed: sa'i sa bon du bstan pa'o //

analyzed: dang po yi ni gsum pa nyid //

analyzed: ces pa ni ga'o //

analyzed: de la zab mo'i chos kyi don yin pas de nyid de ni'i sgra'i don to //

translated: The word own should be taught as arisen from the tooth.üîΩ The fifth of the fourthüîΩ is na.üîΩThe fourth of the fifth

analyzed: lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang // zhes pa ni bha'o //

analyzed: ra dang ka la sogs pa'i sbyor bas 'dod pa gsal bar byed pa ste /

original: ni'i sgras bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ni'i sgras bstan pa'o //

analyzed: de bzhin bcu gcig pa nyid ni // zhes pa ni de bzhin du phat kyi yan lag dang nyid lag tu gyur pa nyid kyis ltung bar @172a * //

analyzed: byed pa'i don bstan pa'o //
